content: **crochet doily for christmas the piece is worked in drops belle ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no vs-039 yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- measurements approx 40 cm / 15 3/4 in diameter materials drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g color 10 moss green the piece can also be crocheted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b see link below drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g/6 or the size needed to get 18 double crochets and 9 row on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height
